thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Oncology Venture And Medical Prognosis Institute Agree On Joint Merger Plan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Oncology Venture And Medical Prognosis Institute Agree On Joint Merger Plan
text:
March 9 (Reuters) - ONCOLOGY VENTURE SWEDEN AB:
* PROPOSED MERGER BETWEEN ONCOLOGY VENTURE AND MEDICAL PROGNOSIS INSTITUTE
* MERGER WILL BE IMPLEMENTED WITH MPI AS CONTINUING LEGAL ENTITY AND OV AS DISCONTINUING ENTITY​
* ‍FOLLOWING COMPLETION OF MERGER COMBINED COMPANY WILL BE REFERRED TO AS ‘ONCOLOGY VENTURE’​
* ‍EXPECTED OPERATIONAL SYNERGIES AMOUNT TO MORE THAN SEK 2 MILLION PER YEAR.​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
